title: Bug 104630: Column icons not appearing when connecting to a Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not showing up in the software.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database:

   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root

4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
6. [Missing step description: Please provide details on what actions to perform in this step.]
